cleaned_text: Tuesday, August 13, 2019, from 7:00 pm to 8:30 pm Eastern (GMT-5) The deep principles and innovative practices of biodynamic agriculture can be taken up by any farmer or gardener wanting to enhance the health and vitality of their soil and the food they grow. In this webinar, we will explore the unique and practical ways that you can apply biodynamics to grow the most nutrient-dense and vibrant food possible, build soil organic matter, revitalize landscapes, and protect the climate by bringing more carbon into the living realm. This is a free interactive video class. Participation in the live webinar is limited to 200 people.
